member.name: T:Normrand.MATLAB_NormalRandom
member.summary:
The MATLAB_NormalRandom class provides a CLS compliant, MWArray interface to the M-functions contained in the files:
C:\Users\Alejandro\Desktop\Normrand\Normrand.m
deployprint.m
printdlg.m

member.name: M:Normrand.MATLAB_NormalRandom.Normrand(System.Int32,MathWorks.MATLAB.NET.Arrays.MWArray[]@,MathWorks.MATLAB.NET.Arrays.MWArray[])
member.summary: Provides an interface for the Normrand function in which the input and output arguments are specified as an array of MWArrays.
member.remarks: This method will allocate and return by reference the output argument array.
member.param: The number of output arguments to return

member.name: M:Normrand.MATLAB_NormalRandom.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
